Page 475
24. Write out first 5 terms of the Binomial series with given k-value
k= 4

Maclaurin Series of f(x): ${\Sigma_{n=0}^\infty\frac{f^{(n)}(0)}{n!}x^n}$

= ${(1+x)^4}$

= 1 + k + ${\frac{k(k-1)}{2!}+\frac{k(k-1)(k-2)}{3!}+\frac{k(k-1)(k-2)(k-3)}{4!}}$

= 1 + 4x + ${6x^2}$ + ${4x^3}$ + ${x^4}$
